price: Lembra-lhes de um dia, quando reunirmos os piedosos, em missão de honra aO Misericordioso,
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
